sourcesContent:
interface ThisInterface {
  [index: string]: {
    [index: string]: string;
  }[]
}

const rootWordsObj: ThisInterface = {
  "Self": [
    {
      "albanian": "është \"is\"",
      "ancient greek": "estí \"is,\"; Dorian Greek entí \"(they) are\" <- *H₁s-enti",
      "armenian": "em \"I am\"",
      "baltic": "OPrus ast \"is\", ēst \"almost\", Lith esti \"is\"",
      "celtic": "OIr is \"is\"; Old Welsh hint \"(they) are\" <- *H₁s-enti",
      "english": "is (< OE is), am",
      "gothic": "ist \"is\"",
      "hittite": "ēszi \"is\"",
      "iranian": "Av asti \"is\"; Persian ast \"is\"",
      "latin": "sum (esse) \"I am (to be)\"; est \"it is\"",
      "pie": "*H₁es- \"to be\", *H₁es-ti \"is\", *H₁és-mi \"am\"  Cf. Indo-European copula(See also *h₁sónts)",
      "sanskrit": "ásti \"is\"; ásmi \"am\"",
      "slavic": "OCS jestŭ \"is\"",
      "tocharian": "B ste \"is\""
    },
    {
      "albanian": "buj, bûj \"I dwell, stay overnight\" < *bunjō",
      "ancient greek": "pʰúomai \"I become\", épʰū \"became\"",
      "armenian": "busanim \"sprout up\"",
      "baltic": "OPrus butwei \"to be\", Lith būti \"to be\"",
      "celtic": "Gaul biiete \"be! (imperative)\";[374][bx] OIr buith \"being\", W bod \"to be\"",
      "english": "be (< OE bēon); OE būan \"to dwell\"",
      "gothic": "bauan \"to dwell\"",
      "hittite": "",
